meanings.definition: Reduced to a state of financial ruin.
meanings.sent1: The bankrupted company had to close its doors.
meanings.sent2: The family felt hopeless after becoming bankrupted.
meanings.sent3: The bankrupted business tried to sell paperclips to survive.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams of success were bankrupted by the economic crisis.
meanings.sent5: The bankrupted town was a ghost of its former self.

meanings.sent1: The bankrupted farm struggled to yield crops.
meanings.sent2: The bankrupted nation faced a severe shortage of food.
meanings.sent3: The bankrupted store sold imaginary items to customers.
meanings.sent4: Her energy was bankrupted after a long day of work.
meanings.sent5: The bankrupted forest was silent and empty.

meanings.sent1: The bankrupted building stood in shambles.
meanings.sent2: The bankrupted shipwreck was a tragic sight.
meanings.sent3: The bankrupted cake was a disaster at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes were bankrupted by the harsh reality.
